My Social Calendar

Find concerts, festivals, local events. Find local gigs and discover new and emerging artists and performers. Create your event, post details about your event and share it with friends.

Track My Faves

Track all your favorite events, artists and performers. Get alerts when your faves are in town.

Create Playlist

Create playlists with your favorite songs and albums and share it with friends. Explore new music and discover new emerging artists.

Rave and rant

You know a 5-star rating when you experience one. Rate and review events, artists and more.

Vote for your faves

Chart Toppers are voted by Fans. Give your support to artists and performers.

Search the directory

Find people and businesses in the music industry

Book live music

Let's us help you entertain your guests. Book live music for your parties, weddings and special occassions.

Book a venue

Guest feedback
